channel.title: Wild things kids vehicle
channel.description: hello everyone, new to the page, I am curious how you all are bypassing the seat switches on the "wild things" any information would be awesome! I already took the rear switch out and saw the four wires. I'm assuming 2 are open and 2 are closing the relay. but which ones? thanks!

item.title: Wild things kids vehicle
item.dc:creator: Mattnauman
item.description:
We removed everything except the wires for the motors for our builds and then rebuilt using an arduino control board. Are you still using the original control board?

Read full topic
